contents.text: Thank you for calling ZeroCater in San Francisco, the number one way companies feed their teams.
For orders and catering services, press 1.
To place a new catering order, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our new orders team.

navigationGoals: Place a new catering order for 15 people for next Tuesday lunch.
I need to place a new catering order for our veterans’ networking lunch.
Initialize a new corporate catering order for 25 attendees with mixed dietary profiles
I’d like to place a catering order for our office lunch next Tuesday.
I’d like to place a new catering order for our upcoming physics study group.

contents.text: To modify or cancel an existing order, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our order support team.

navigationGoals: Modify my existing catering order scheduled for tomorrow and update the headcount.
I need to modify the delivery time on my existing catering order for a veteran support event.
Modify the headcount and menu items of my existing catering order scheduled for tomorrow
I need to update the headcount on my existing catering order.
I need to modify the lunch order I placed earlier this week for our lab meeting.

contents.text: For account and billing inquiries, press 2.
For billing and invoice questions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Obtain a copy of my latest catering invoice and clarify a billing charge.
I need a detailed invoice for my last catering order to submit for veteran assistance reimbursement.
Retrieve the PDF invoice for last week's catering order and verify the line-item charges
Could you help me understand a charge on my last invoice?
I have a question about a charge on our most recent catering invoice.

contents.text: For account settings and technical support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account support team.

navigationGoals: Update my account payment method and resolve a login issue.
I need help updating my account settings and applying my veteran discount to my profile.
Reset my account password and enable two-factor authentication for enhanced security
I’m having trouble logging into my account and need assistance.
I need assistance updating my account settings, specifically my contact email.
